creator: nettings@apache.org
text:
steps to reproduce: on zones or a fresh checkout:
* add new xhtml document
* edit it using bxe, save and exit.
you will still see the example content, not your edits.
now edit again using oneform, and you will see that the edits are actually
there, they are just not being displayed.

another symptom: all pages you visited before a new page is created will not
show the newly created page in their menus. the sitetree view in the "site" tab
shows it correctly, though.
creator: nettings@apache.org
andreas@apache.org
text: I can confirm the problem. It is reproducable with the web tests.

creator: andreas@apache.org
text:
I guess the problem is that the RepositorySourceValidity stores a reference to
an outdated repository node. It should require a new node when testing its last
modification date.

creator: nettings@apache.org
text: works for me! thanks for the quick fix.
